questions.question: What are you passionate about?
Tell us about some experiences you've had in your life that have been difficult or challenging
What change do you want to make in the world in your lifetime?
If you met an alien, how would you describe yourself to that being?
Tell us about your failures
What are your goals?
Why do you want a job?
What do you know about web products? Web technologies? Saas?
What do we mean when we say we are ramen profitable, and chaotic good?
Are you sure you want to work for a startup with less pay but offers a lot of opportunities?
If we give you a P200,000 budget, what will you do with it?
What industry are we in? Who are our competitors?
Have you ever used/visited one of our products?
What's a creative way of marketing web based services/products to the Filipino?
Name a piece of technology you've read about recently. What is your own creative execution to monetize the product/service.
Describe a technical problem you had and how you solved it.

Outline you experience or familiarity with the following:
							Scrum, Agile
							Ruby, Rails, PHP
							Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla
							API Integration
							JavaScript, XHTML, CSS
							MySQL
							Android, iOS
							Entrepreneurship
What do you know about the web and mobile technologies industry (both local and global)?

Name three websites that you visit often and like. What do you like about the user interface and design? Choose one of the three sites and comment on what new feature or project you would work on. How would you design it?
If you are a business owner, how would you issue equity?
Do you have any SEO experience? Please elaborate.
How can we earn using Facebook?
How do you make sure that your code is both safe and fast?
What is the last thing you learned about algorithms from a book, magazine or web site?
Do you know anything about Augmented Reality?
Any interest in Android/iPhone app development?
What is your Facebook page? LinkedIn page? Yunnoh page? Twitter page?
Which kind of diagrams do you use to track progress in a project?
Any experience in marketing a service/product? Making a successful sale?
Do you currently own a laptop? What are the specs?
When are you available to start?
How many hours per week do you want?
How much per hour do you want?

How far of a commute is Taguig for you? Will you be able to work in Taguig Monday through Friday between 8am and 5pm with the possibility of OT? Would you be willing to find a location nearer the office, during the weekdays, if Taguig is too far for you?
